variables.name: EXTRA_ALLOWABLE_ACCOUNTS_ARRAYLIST
variables.comment:
* A Parcelable ArrayList of Account objects that limits the choosable accounts to those
     * in this list, if this parameter is supplied.

variables.name: EXTRA_ALLOWABLE_ACCOUNT_TYPES_STRING_ARRAY
variables.comment:
* A Parcelable ArrayList of String objects that limits the accounts to choose to those
     * that match the types in this list, if this parameter is supplied. This list is also
     * used to filter the allowable account types if add account is selected.

variables.name: EXTRA_ADD_ACCOUNT_OPTIONS_BUNDLE
variables.comment:
* This is passed as the addAccountOptions parameter in AccountManager.addAccount()
     * if it is called.

variables.name: EXTRA_ADD_ACCOUNT_REQUIRED_FEATURES_STRING_ARRAY
variables.comment:
* This is passed as the requiredFeatures parameter in AccountManager.addAccount()
     * if it is called.

variables.name: EXTRA_ADD_ACCOUNT_AUTH_TOKEN_TYPE_STRING
variables.comment:
* This is passed as the authTokenType string in AccountManager.addAccount()
     * if it is called.

variables.name: EXTRA_SELECTED_ACCOUNT
variables.comment: * If set then the specified account is already "selected".

variables.name: EXTRA_ALWAYS_PROMPT_FOR_ACCOUNT
variables.comment:
* Deprecated. Providing this extra to {@link ChooseTypeAndAccountActivity}
     * will have no effect.

variables.name: EXTRA_DESCRIPTION_TEXT_OVERRIDE
variables.comment:
* If set then this string will be used as the description rather than
     * the default.

variables.name: mPossiblyVisibleAccounts
variables.comment: Currently NOT_VISBILE accounts are not shown at all.

methods.name: protected void onActivityResult(final int requestCode, final int resultCode, final Intent data)
methods.comment: return the result and finish this activity.

methods.name: private void setNonLabelThemeAndCallSuperCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
methods.comment:
* The default activity theme shows label at the top. Set a theme which does
     * not show label, which effectively makes the activity invisible. Note that
     * no content is being set. If something gets set, using this theme may be
     * useless.

methods.name: private void setResultAndFinish(final String accountName, final String accountType)
private int getItemIndexToSelect(ArrayList<Account> accounts, String selectedAccountName, boolean selectedAddNewAccount)
methods.comment:
* @return a value between 0 (inclusive) and accounts.size() (inclusive) or SELECTED_ITEM_NONE.
     *      An index value of accounts.size() indicates 'Add account' option.

methods.name: private LinkedHashMap<Account, Integer> getAcceptableAccountChoices(AccountManager accountManager)
methods.comment:
* Create a list of Account objects for each account that is acceptable. Filter out accounts
     * that don't match the allowable types, if provided, or that don't match the allowable
     * accounts, if provided.

methods.name: private Set<String> getReleventAccountTypes(final Intent intent)
methods.comment:
* Return a set of account types specified by the intent as well as supported by the
     * AccountManager.

methods.name: private Set<Account> getAllowableAccountSet(final Intent intent)
methods.comment:
* Returns a set of whitelisted accounts given by the intent or null if none specified by the
     * intent.

methods.name: private void overrideDescriptionIfSupplied(String descriptionOverride)
methods.comment:
* Overrides the description text view for the picker activity if specified by the intent.
     * If not specified then makes the description invisible.

methods.name: private final void populateUIAccountList(String[] listItems)
methods.comment:
* Populates the UI ListView with the given list of items and selects an item
     * based on {@code mSelectedItemIndex} member variable.

methodNames: protected void onActivityResult(final int requestCode, final int resultCode, final Intent data)
private void setResultAndFinish(final String accountName, final String accountType)
private int getItemIndexToSelect(ArrayList<Account> accounts, String selectedAccountName, boolean selectedAddNewAccount)
